entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
